question: Which of the following was the editor of the first all-Hindi newspaper ‘Udanta Martanda’ which was published from Calcutta in the year 1826?
explanation: The first all Hindu newspaper “ Udanta-Martanda” was published from Kanpur in the year 1826. Pandit Jugal Kishore Shukla was the editor of the Udanta-Martanda newspaper.  This was the first time a newspaper was published completely in Hindi, using the Devanagari script.
